title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8190 - Assessment Rolls
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8190 - Assessment Rolls

State Regulations

Subpart 8190-1 - Form And Preparation (§ 8190-1.1 to 8190-1.6)

Subpart 8190-2 - Assessment Disclosure Notice (§ 8190-2.1)

Subpart 8190-3 - Systems Of Real Property Tax Administration Utilizing Computers (§ 8190-3.1 to 8190-3.2)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8190

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §307; Real

Property Tax Law, §§ 202[1][k], [l], 312, 501, 502, 504, 510, 510-a, 511, 575, 1200, 1202, 1314, 1573, 1592, 1804, 1806, 1905, 1906; State Finance Law, § 97-k
k; L. 1987, chs. 416, 634

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
